name: WhitePaperInterestRateModel
description: The Compound Standard Interest Rate Model with pluggable constants. See Section 2.4 of the Compound Whitepaper.

functionDecorators.name: getBorrowRate
functionDecorators.description: Gets the current borrow interest rate based on the given asset, total cash, total borrows and total reserves. The return value should be scaled by 1e18, thus a return value of `(true, 1000000000000)` implies an interest rate of 0.000001 or 0.0001% *per block*.

parameterDecorators.name: cash
parameterDecorators.description: The total cash of the underlying asset in the CToken.

parameterDecorators.name: borrows
parameterDecorators.description: The total borrows of the underlying asset in the CToken.

parameterDecorators.name: _reserves
parameterDecorators.description: The total reserves of the underlying asset in the CToken.
